title: Jennifer Lawrence to marry Cooke Maroney on Saturday as menu revealed
text:
Jennifer and Cooke are getting married this week (Picture: REX)

New details about Jennifer Lawrence’s wedding to Cooke Maroney have been revealed as the pair prepare to tie the knot eight months after getting engaged.

The Mother! star, 29, has reportedly enlisted celebrity wedding planner Mark Seed to plan the big day, which is set to take place this Saturday (19 October).

TMZ reports that the nuptials will take place in front of 150 guests in Rhode Island this weekend, and revealed what guests will be eating and drinking.

Their source claims those who were lucky enough to make it onto the guestlist will get specialty cocktails including bourbon old fashioneds and gin cucumber lavender champagnes.

Canapes served on the day will include cod beignet, sweet potato flat cakes, brussels sprouts with cured egg yolk and smoked pork belly with pickled apple.

Main courses will be wood-roasted fish with herbs and lemon-infused butter or five-week-aged leg of beef with foragers sauce.

If their guests have any room left for dessert, they will be treated to fire-baked sourdough bread pudding with chocolate, salted caramel and fresh apple, cauldron fritters with bourbon cream and cinnamon sugar and homemade s’mores.

JLaw and Cooke got engaged just eight months ago (Picture: Rex Features)

The couple were seen at a marriage bureau in New York in September along with two security guards and a friend, as well as celebrity photographer Mark Seliger.

Although there were rumours that the couple had already done the deed, it’s likely they were getting their marriage license ahead of the big day.

‘Jennifer and Cooke were at the weddings bureau together on the morning of September 16,’ a source told Us Weekly.

‘They had a female friend and a photographer with them the entire time. They sat in the couches to the left and were trying to remain unseen.’

Jennifer had also had a secret hen do with singer Adele, with a source telling People it was a raucous affair: ‘We had a hilarious time where Jennifer Lawrence and Adele came.

‘They went downstairs to the basement and Jennifer got her makeup done by the drag queens.

‘And she peed in a bucket because she didn’t want to go all the way back upstairs! Adele was there going, “she’s the face of Chanel!”’
